mapper.sql: id, school, userName, userNo, fxTime, fxCountry, fxProvince, fxCity, fxTown, fxVehicle, throughEpidemicArea, trainNum, createTime
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS fx_num,SUM(IF(fx_addr_country !='中国',1,0)) AS jwfx_num, SUM(IF(fx_addr_province !='河南省',1,0)) AS wsfx_num FROM (SELECT * FROM yq_fxdata_collection WHERE school='山东英才学院' GROUP BY user_no) FXRY
mapper.insert: insert into yq_fxdata_collection (id, school, userName, userNo, fxTime, fxCountry, fxProvince, fxCity, fxTown, fxVehicle, throughEpidemicArea, trainNum, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fxcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxtown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxvehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{throughepidemicarea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trainnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
school,
userName,
userNo,

mapper.update:
update yq_fxdata_collection
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userNo = #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxTime = #{fxtime,jdbcType=DATE},
fxCountry = #{fxcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxProvince = #{fxprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxCity = #{fxcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxTown = #{fxtown,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxVehicle = #{fxvehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
throughEpidemicArea = #{throughepidemicarea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trainNum = #{trainnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
